posts.post_content:
Three very nice and presentable t206s up for sale or trade.

Charlie Starr: Very presentable. Would say good+ to very good. Looking for [STRIKE]$29[/STRIKE]. [STRIKE]$25[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$23[/STRIKE] $22

Josh Clark: Graded an SGC 1. Sharp card. Small pinhole and a little dirty. Pencil mark as well. Would be looking for [STRIKE]$21 [/STRIKE]$19[STRIKE][/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$16[/STRIKE] SOLD!

Rube Manning: Raw good+ to very good. Little hairline crease through the middle. Some peeling on the back. Looking for [STRIKE]$30.[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$28[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$26[/STRIKE]$25

[STRIKE]Tom Downey: Condition is apparent. Looking for only $15. [/STRIKE] SOLD!


All prices include shipping. Open to trade offers as well as I will negotiate. Thanks for looking!
Haha, I clicked this again after I saw you posted last cuz I knew what you were going to say :D
Dropsssss againnnnnn!! Help me pay for sterling!
Clark and Downey Sold! Thank you!

[quote name="wazoo" post=1425544]Dropsssss againnnnnn!! Help me pay for sterling![/QUOTE]


What is this desperation?  No pity for you, sir! [emoji41]

[quote name="freakhappy" post=1425622]What is this desperation?  No pity for you, sir! [emoji41][/QUOTE]

Always waiting for a nice comment from you, MR. CAVE. Some of us got a little too excited with the bidding my friend.

[quote name="wazoo" post=1425623]Always waiting for a nice comment from you, MR. CAVE. Some of us got a little too excited with the bidding my friend.[/QUOTE]


Don't we all, my friend, don't we all.  At least you have some nice cardboard to look at [emoji16]
Prices include shipping. Can't get commons with nice eye appeal for much cheaper.
